#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t,n,a,b,c,d;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d%d%d%d%d",&n,&a,&b,&c,&d);
                   if(n%a==0 && n/a!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%b==0 && n/b!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%c==0 && n/c!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%d==0 && n/d!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+b)==0 && n/(a+b)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+c)==0 && n/(a+c)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+d)==0 && n/(a+d)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(c+b)==0 && n/(c+b)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(d+b)==0 && n/(d+b)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(c+d)==0 && n/(c+d)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+b+c)==0 && n/(a+b+c)!=0) printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+b+d)==0 && n/(a+b+d)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+c+d)==0 && n/(a+c+d)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(b+c+d)==0 && n/(b+c+d)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else if(n%(a+b+c+d)==0&& n/(a+b+c+d)!=0)printf("YES\n");
              else printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
